General.Name: Zhejiang Baoxiniao Garment Co Ltd
General.Description: Baoxiniao Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of branded clothing products in China. Its products include suits, trousers, shirts, jackets, sheep sweaters, POLO shirts, down jackets, quick-drying clothes, casual pants, leather shoes and bags, and leather goods. The company sells its products through operating retail shops, as well as through online under the SAINT ANGELO, HAZZYS, LaFuma, SOLOSALI, HENRY GRANT, Cloud wing intelligence, BONO, Camicissima, and elitebasic brand names. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Baoxiniao Garment Co., Ltd and changed its name to Baoxiniao Holding Co., Ltd. in 2017. Baoxiniao Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Wenzhou, China.

2.Name: Ms. Hai Jing  Xie
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of Board of Directors
